member.name: P:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Connection
member.summary: Gets a connection to a database.

member.name: E:WebMatrix.Data.Database.ConnectionOpened
member.summary: Occurs when a new database connection is opened by a instance.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Execute(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes an SQL statement (with optional parameters) such as INSERT, DELETE, or UPDATE and returns a count of affected records..
member.param: (Optional) The parameters used to pass values into the SQL statement.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.GetLastInsertId
member.summary: Returns the identity column from the most recently inserted row.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Opens either the specified database file or the database specified using a named connection string from the Web.config file.
member.param: The name or connection string of the database.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.OpenConnectionString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens a database using a connection string.
member.param: Information about how to connect to a database.
(Optional) The name of the .NET Framework data provider that is used to connect to the data source.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Query(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Queries the database using a SQL statement (optionally passing parameters) and returns the results in result.
member.param: Represents a SQL statement to execute against the data source.
(Optional) The parameters used to pass values into the SQL statement.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.QuerySingle(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a SQL statement (with optional parameters) and returns a single record.
member.param: Represents a SQL statement to execute against the data source.
(Optional) The parameters used to pass values into the SQL statement.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.QueryValue(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a SQL statement (with optional parameters) and returns a single value.
member.param: Represents a SQL statement to execute against the data source.
(Optional) The parameters used to pass values into the SQL statement.
